Forum reaches 1400 members! Join over 1400 people who have already registered at our forum ! Colleges Court Homeschoolers! Find out how and why some colleges are courting homeschoolers - and yes, that's Mary Pride's daughter in the photo! More... 25 New Articles Added! Click here to view them! How to Get Started in Homeschooling Mary Pride explains the essential ten steps. Mary Pride's New Book Now in Stock! The fifth edition of the world's best-selling homeschool series is here! More... Free 2006 Bible Reading Plan from Practical Homeschooling! Read through the Bible in a year with this handy planner in printable .pdf format! Requires Adobe Acrobat Reader . Homeschooler Wins 2005 National Geographic Bee! The National Geographic Bee champion for 2005 is Nathan Cornelius of Minnesota, a homeschooled 13-year-old. More... Homeschooler Ties for Second in 2005 Scripps National Spelling Bee! Texan Samir Patel not only spelled correctly nearly all the words he drew during the Scripps National Spelling Bee, he also rattled off their definitions. More... Attention, Librarians and Homeschoolers Who Use the Library! We need your suggestions on how libraries can help homeschoolers and how homeschoolers can help libraries. More... New in the Home Life Catalog! We've added five great new series! Extreme 3-D lets you see creepie crawlies and inside your own body. Model Makers and Flight Test Lab let you learn the history of military hardware and flight while building great models. Fine Art Studio is a serious hands-on introduction to drawing, painting, and sculpting. And Science Lab is just what the future doctor ordered! New in the Home Life Catalog: Freddy the Pig! Read about Freddy as he solves mysteries and averts disaster in Freddy and the Bean Home News, Freddy the Cowboy, Freddy the Detective, Freddy Goes Camping, Freddy the Politician, Freddy and the Perilous Adventure, Freddy Rides Again, & Freddy and Simon the Dictator! More... New in the Home Life Catalog: Prince Valiant #43-50! More in the adventures of Prince Valiant as he rights wrongs and defends the kingdom. More... Homeschoolers and the ACT Homeschoolers ace the ACT pre-college test . . . again. More... [PDF File] New Study Shows Hands-On Projects Improve Academics! For years homeschoolers have been saying that hands-on learning improves retention, creativity, application, cooperation, and motivation. Want to see the proof? Click here to view the study summary! (964 kb) Dr. Dobson Tells Christians to Get Kids Out of California Public Schools On March 28, 2002, Focus on the Family founder, James C. Dobson, PhD, stated on his daily radio broadcast: "In the state of California, if I had a child there, I wouldn't put the youngster in a public school.... I think it's time to get our kids out. And I'm going to get hit for [saying] that." More... Dr. Laura supports Dr. Dobson: "Take your kids out of public schools." Parents flock to support separation of school and state. More... Attention, Practical Homeschoooling Readers! For years I've been telling everyone how important testimonials are for their marketing. Naturally, I've been too shy to ask my own readers for permission to use their many kind words in this way. Well, it's time! Please click here to share your thoughts about PHS with others. Attention, Readers of Mary Pride's Complete Guide! I need your kind words, too. Please click here to let others know how my new book has helped you. Attention, Big Book of Home Learning readers!
